description: USA Today Reviewed.com named the Crossfade LP2…"2012 headphones of the year"Crossfade M-100 raises the barfor both precision audio and rock-solid engineering…Why M-100?Superior SoundUnrivaled DurabilityComfort, Customization, StyleCompact  PortabilityDetachable Microphone & Audio CablesSuperior Sound"I completely fell in love with the Crossfade M-100s"-GizmodoImmersive 3D Soundstage…  evokes the experience of a live performanceClean Deep Bass… feel and hear the precise vibrations of your music without bloated boom or a muddy mid-rangeUltra Wide Clarity & Vivid Midrange…  hear lifelike vocals, crystal clear cymbals and crispy hi-hats
title: V-MODA Crossfade M-100 Over-Ear Noise-Isolating Metal Headphone (Shadow)
